task.title: Log in the PBX Web Interface

taskbody.context:
Your administrator will send an email that contains the login information to you. Check the information in the email, and log in the PBX web interface.
If you didn't receive the email, contact your administrator to get your extension information and the login information.

step.cmd: Open the email that your administrator sent to you, click the password reset link to set your login password.

info.note: You need to reset your password in 24 hours after you receive the email, or the password reset link will be invalid.

step.cmd: Visit the domain of your PBX, enter your email address and your password, click Login.
